text: Marcos Andrés López Cabrera (born 4 February 1993) is an Ecuadorian footballer who plays as a defender for Ecuadorian Serie A side Universidad Católica and the Ecuador national team. He made his debut for Ecuador on 6 September 2019 in a match against Peru. He has tattoos dedicated to his brother and sister on his arm, as well as the Spanish phrase "You taught me the right way to live, I have to choose the right way to die." ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:Ecuador international footballers Category:C.D.
